thread.title: Son of Murdered Kim Jong Nam Surfaces in Video
thread.title_full: Son of Murdered Kim Jong Nam Surfaces in Video

title: Son of Murdered Kim Jong Nam Surfaces in Video
text:
Son of Murdered Kim Jong Nam Surfaces in Video Kim Han Sol says he is safely with his mother and sister; does not say where The son of Kim Jong Nam, the slain half brother of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, has appeared in a video posted online by a mysterious advocacy group. Photo: AFP/Getty By Google+ Updated March 8, 2017 1:29 a.m. ET 
KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia—The son of Kim Jong Nam, the estranged half brother of North Korea’s ruler who was killed in Malaysia three weeks ago, has appeared in an online video posted by a group that says it rescued his family with the assistance of four governments. 
Speaking English, he identifies himself as Kim Han Sol, shows his redacted passport, and says he is speaking a few days after the Feb. 13 killing and is safely with his... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
